title: Kill Stealing in Game
body:
I think that Riot should implement a feature where if one person gets rid of at least 75% of a champions health, and then another player steals the kill/gets the last 25%, the announcer says "Kill Steal" and the killer gets less gold while the person they stole it off gets more gold for the assist. This way, people will be punished for a kill steal. Overall the amount of gold earned by the TEAM for a kill is the same, but it is balanced between the killer and person they stole it from differently.

I think this would be a cool idea to put into the game.
Please share this if you agree and give me any feedback/constructive criticism.

replies.body:

- If a team mate of mine engages an enemy but fails to kill them, leaving them with less than 25% health, and I **SECURE THE KILL** for my team, I'm punished?
- If I engage an enemy with an ally but my ally deals 3 times as much damage as I do and I happen to deal the killing blow, I'm punished?
- If a team mate of mine engages an enemy but ends up needing to retreat, but has also left the enemy with less than 25% health, and I **SAVE THEM**, I'm punished?
- And, to top it all off, the announce names and shames me?
